component.name: Emoji Mart
component.summary: A modern popup emoji picker, based on the Emoji Mart web component.

description.p: Modern emoji picker popup for desktop, based on the Emoji Mart web component.
Launch the emoji picker with the configurable keyboard shortcut `Alt+Space`, and select emojis to paste in the clipboard.

ul.li: 🍾 Built as a popup: quick invocation, and disappears when not needed, does not stay as a standalone window
💽 Runs in the background, with a system tray icon to invoke or stop the app
⚔️ Cross-platform, can be installed natively on Linux, MacOS, or Windows
🧑‍🚀 Uses modern and popular technologies, making it easier to maintain and build upon in the future
🪶 Light on resources: built with Tauri and Solid JS
